list_of_reviews.review_title: Potential criminal enterprise - extreme negligence at best
list_of_reviews.review: I have had a kraken account for years and all was fine, till some weeks ago a verification request came up. I have sent all required documents various times, got in contact with them and was told everything was fine and to wait. My account is completely legal, the funds are of transparent origin, all my paperwork is in order and I have complied every step of the way. Nevertheless, all of a sudden my access to the account and the funds has been cut off. I have no idea if kraken has illegally appropriated my funds or what is going on. Their support desk is completely unresponsive, complaints are not taken serious at all, in most cases not even answered. If you have an account there, close it, take your money and run. I regret deeply entrusting them with my money, big mistake

list_of_reviews.review_title: I opened an account which was promptly terminated without explanation by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account.  Submitted my proof of residence.  Deposited a small amount of money. Within a week I receive a notice that my account is being closed with no explanation "due to security reasons".   My mailing address is a PO Box in Massachusetts.  I submitted my electric bill as proof of address.  Duh, the mailing address on my mail is to the PO Box so of course proof shows the PO Box.   License shows physical address.  So I am not sure why the account was closed.  I was told to withdraw my initial deposited funds.  Money was returned.  Seems to me this is a "business" that does not want peoples business.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken is a crock of s h i t
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken is a crock of s h i t. My deposit was flagged as suspicious by the bank and when I queried this with Kraken I got an email informing me my account will be closed and I can’t open another account.No explanation, no reason.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken canceled my account after I made…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken canceled my account after I made a test deposit to verify deposit. Now they won't refund my balance or give me a reason for closing the account. As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Had some elicit transactions in my bank…
list_of_reviews.review: Had some elicit transactions in my bank account with Kraken as a source of funds which had been transfered.  Was able to log into Kraken and noticed 1/2 bogus transactions.  Reported problem to them and have since emailed and called numerous times.  Account has been closed leaving me with no recourse other than waiting. They did send emails showing they had voided the transactions, but after almost a month, still cannot log in.

list_of_reviews.review_title: HORRIBLE Company to Deal With
list_of_reviews.review: I would like to confirm every bad review you read about Kraken.  Terrible customer service.  They will close your account without any attempt to remedy the alleged problem.  Apparently I was very lucky that I had not been able to complete any purchases before they did this to me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken are thieves. Ticket#12566698
list_of_reviews.review: I don't know where I should even start. The customer experience cannot get worse than this. It's a straight robbery. I deposited with Interac transfer a few days ago 3000 CAD into my Kraken account and received confirmation from both the bank and Interac that the money was collected. Ticket number #12566698. Reaching out to the live chat wasn't a fruitful idea - they have made me wait for 6 hours a few times and never got a response. The only response was an auto-reply saying I would receive an email which I never did! My bank cannot recall the transfer so my money went to nowhere! Happy Halving Day (for Kraken, not investors)!Beware of this!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible service
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible service. My ticket has been pending for months and there is no other follow up than some standard templates im being sent. I cannot log into my account because their verification system does not allow me to upload the right documents. Kraken is not following up correctly. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I could leave a zero star
list_of_reviews.review: I wish I could leave a zero stars for support! I opened an account so that I could offramp some XRP. I can understand that my initial proof of address was rejected as part of the verification, but it has been a nightmare ever since I tried to correct that. Support reached out asking for this proof, which I gave. I have been ghosted for the past two weeks, and whenever I reach out to live support (which takes 3 hours) I am told the ticket is still open.I have asked to close the account because I found an alternative, and the support also says I should email my request to the same person who is ghosting me. It seems creating an account works like clockwork, but deleting one is practically impossible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a fair profit using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I made a fair profit using Kraken. I did buy and stake Bitcoin at $40,000, along with whatever ETH, SOL, and ADA were priced at the time (January 2024).I have sold Bitcoin around $60,000 (April 2024). The other assets went up roughly the same, so I made about 50% profit.There are alot of transanction fees and I didn't realise the "earn" function was sent to third parties for their profit. But overall I made a profit and got my money back, so am satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Kraken at all costs - Terrible experience
list_of_reviews.review: I would strongly advise against using Kraken. On April 4th, 2024, I transferred a significant amount of money into my Kraken account. As of today, the funds are still being held by the platform. I have reached out to their support team multiple times, and all they have said is that they have a high volume of requests and that they have escalated my issue to a specialized team.This is completely unacceptable. It feels like outright fraud to hold onto customers' money indefinitely with no resolution in sight. There are much better cryptocurrency exchanges out there that provide reliable service and timely transactions. Do yourself a favor and avoid Kraken - it's just not worth the headache and potential loss of your hard-earned money. Terrible experience overall.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Excellent and helpful and efficient support service
list_of_reviews.review: I have had almost immediate help that was very efficient from Kraken support on several occasions the last time was 26th March Cant understand why people are complaining Amongst the lowest fees too. Much better functionality than Coinbase

list_of_reviews.review_title: My pending withdawal was on hold for a…
list_of_reviews.review: My pending withdawal was on hold for a month now. I emailed 10 times to kraken support for any update on my withdrawal. They just keep ignoring my email and never email me back. Terrible customer support seriously

list_of_reviews.review_title: Not Great
list_of_reviews.review: This platform is quite hostile to users. 1.Lost of hidden behind the scene messy doings. 2.Very high fees on everything, for nothing. 3.They like to hold your account hostage often and at all the worst possible times. I have experienced blocks and locks and all manner of interference and corresponding loses.4.Every single support requests results on very lengthy and tech complex 'KYC' audits and compliances 'requests' instead of fixing anything.Their KYC's is 'requested' very very often, not once, but repeatedly anytime they are contacted for support or for anything else regardless of having already gone through their whole system of supposed KYC. 5. Support, contacts and queries are passed along from 'agent's to 'agent's and never answered. Then the whole thing repeats again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Blocked my account with all my money
list_of_reviews.review: Blocked my account with all my money! Support doesn't answer anything.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible.Shut my account down for no reason - no explanation given.Had to cash out my crypto to fiat and transfer to bank account (not just transfer to another wallet or exchange).Just given 72hrs to do it, and some of my crypto was on a dip, so cashing out cost me, then it'll cost me again to buy it back.Terrible lack of customer service, they just said:Unfortunately, we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action.Please note that you still have a balance on your Kraken account. Therefore, we request that you complete the following actions within the next 72 hours (from the time and date of this message):• Convert your crypto to cash and withdraw your remaining balance to a bank account in your own name.• Export all your trade and ledger history as we will be unable to provide it to you later.Deposit services have already been disabled for your account. After the 72 hours have passed, your account will be closed.Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account. We may reach out to you if we require additional documentation.We appreciate your understanding.That's what they said, and looking at forums it's happening to a lot of people who are mystified as to why.A real shame, as the exchange is functionally good, but as for customer service, totally diabolical.STEER CLEAR

list_of_reviews.review_title: My transfer from my Kraken Spot account…
list_of_reviews.review: My transfer from my Kraken Spot account to the Kraken Future account has been pending for 3 days. Support ticket was created after 30 minutes whereafter a customer service responded that he would create a support ticket for me and that I would be contacted on email, which no one has done. So disappointing that such a large company cannot manage transfers between my own account's portfolios... Public ID: AA44 N84G IU4P UCEQ

list_of_reviews.review_title: KRAKEN WILL REPLY ONCE BUT WILL NOT HELP YOU
list_of_reviews.review: April 18, 2024 UPDATEA phone appointment finally account verified had 7000.00 now 1555.00 some idiot moves our money to ETH Kraken steals your money and will not give you access to your account on line I have been trying to get to my account since March 15,2024 and kraken will not assist and a police report has been filed and still nothing as far as I am concerned kraken has stolen $7000.00 so don’t use them unless you like giving your money away.also one star is giving them too much credit more like zero stars!! This company of course will reply to this and do nothing they do not help you so please so not use this company they will take your funds and they do not help you get back into your account!! Over 30 days and they did nothing but keep my 7000.00 and I am going to report them to anyone and everyone who will listen because I have proof and this is my account my funds and they will not helping me so please be very careful and never believe anyone who calls you too many scammers out there and as far as I am concerned kraken is a scam. And they never answer there phones and when you do leave your number for them to call back they never do!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid at all costs!
list_of_reviews.review: I decided to open an account on Kraken and invest some of my savings in Bitcoin. After providing all the required information, I received confirmation of my account setup within just a few minutes. Additionally, they granted me Intermediate status. On the same day, I transferred $5,000 (their bank took its commission) and bought 0.06799729 BTC. Kraken took their fee plus they probably converted dollars into euros at a rate known only to them. Nevertheless, I was satisfied - I invested almost 5000 dollars in Bitcoin, now it was just a matter of waiting calmly for the exchange rate to rise. I was mistaken. On next day, I received an email from Kraken with information that my account will be closed. They gave me 72 hours to sell the BTC and withdraw the money. They provided no reason for such a decision! They wrote: "For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action"It is worth noting that these 72 hours fell on Saturday and Sunday, furthermore, it was Easter holidays.I sold the BTC I owned (they charged another fee) and transferred the money to my dollar account (another exchange). As a result I lost several hundred dollars. So avoid!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Photo id verification is terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Photo id is terrible.  I get it that the FEDs are overreaching cause they're envious of money being made but Kraken is playing into their hand by making impossible to access my account, so I'm going to close my account after some 8 years.

list_of_reviews.review_title: kraken stole my money!!!!
list_of_reviews.review: i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316

list_of_reviews.review_title: Quite better than other Platforms
list_of_reviews.review: Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

list_of_reviews.review_title: You shut down my account and need to…
list_of_reviews.review: You shut down my account and need to refund MY $5600 USD.4/49 Update:  I did receive an acknowledgement that my funding is processed for return.  Hopefully that will occur soon.  I will update my posting when that happens...

Within a week I receive a notice that my account is being closed with no explanation "due to security reasons".   My mailing address is a PO Box in Massachusetts.  I submitted my electric bill as proof of address.  Duh, the mailing address on my mail is to the PO Box so of course proof shows the PO Box.   License shows physical address.  So I am not sure why the account was closed.  I was told to withdraw my initial deposited funds.  Money was returned.  Seems to me this is a "business" that does not want peoples business.

list_of_reviews.review: Kraken is a crock of s h i t. My deposit was flagged as suspicious by the bank and when I queried this with Kraken I got an email informing me my account will be closed and I can’t open another account.No explanation, no reason.

As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Had some elicit transactions in my bank…

Reported problem to them and have since emailed and called numerous times.  Account has been closed leaving me with no recourse other than waiting. They did send emails showing they had voided the transactions, but after almost a month, still cannot log in.

list_of_reviews.review_title: HORRIBLE Company to Deal With
list_of_reviews.review: I would like to confirm every bad review you read about Kraken.  Terrible customer service.  They will close your account without any attempt to remedy the alleged problem.  Apparently I was very lucky that I had not been able to complete any purchases before they did this to me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken are thieves. Ticket#12566698
list_of_reviews.review: I don't know where I should even start. The customer experience cannot get worse than this. It's a straight robbery. I deposited with Interac transfer a few days ago 3000 CAD into my Kraken account and received confirmation from both the bank and Interac that the money was collected. Ticket number #12566698. Reaching out to the live chat wasn't a fruitful idea - they have made me wait for 6 hours a few times and never got a response. The only response was an auto-reply saying I would receive an email which I never did! My bank cannot recall the transfer so my money went to nowhere! Happy Halving Day (for Kraken, not investors)!Beware of this!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible service
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible service. My ticket has been pending for months and there is no other follow up than some standard templates im being sent. I cannot log into my account because their verification system does not allow me to upload the right documents. Kraken is not following up correctly. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I could leave a zero star
list_of_reviews.review: I wish I could leave a zero stars for support! I opened an account so that I could offramp some XRP. I can understand that my initial proof of address was rejected as part of the verification, but it has been a nightmare ever since I tried to correct that. Support reached out asking for this proof, which I gave. I have been ghosted for the past two weeks, and whenever I reach out to live support (which takes 3 hours) I am told the ticket is still open.I have asked to close the account because I found an alternative, and the support also says I should email my request to the same person who is ghosting me. It seems creating an account works like clockwork, but deleting one is practically impossible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Kraken at all costs - Terrible experience
list_of_reviews.review: I would strongly advise against using Kraken. On April 4th, 2024, I transferred a significant amount of money into my Kraken account. As of today, the funds are still being held by the platform. I have reached out to their support team multiple times, and all they have said is that they have a high volume of requests and that they have escalated my issue to a specialized team.This is completely unacceptable. It feels like outright fraud to hold onto customers' money indefinitely with no resolution in sight. There are much better cryptocurrency exchanges out there that provide reliable service and timely transactions. Do yourself a favor and avoid Kraken - it's just not worth the headache and potential loss of your hard-earned money. Terrible experience overall.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible.Shut my account down for no reason - no explanation given.Had to cash out my crypto to fiat and transfer to bank account (not just transfer to another wallet or exchange).Just given 72hrs to do it, and some of my crypto was on a dip, so cashing out cost me, then it'll cost me again to buy it back.Terrible lack of customer service, they just said:Unfortunately, we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. Therefore, we request that you complete the following actions within the next 72 hours (from the time and date of this message):• Convert your crypto to cash and withdraw your remaining balance to a bank account in your own name.• Export all your trade and ledger history as we will be unable to provide it to you later.Deposit services have already been disabled for your account. We may reach out to you if we require additional documentation.We appreciate your understanding.That's what they said, and looking at forums it's happening to a lot of people who are mystified as to why.A real shame, as the exchange is functionally good, but as for customer service, totally diabolical.STEER CLEAR

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify common themes and issues mentioned in the reviews about kraken.com. Summarize the main points of dissatisfaction or satisfaction among users. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have specific reviews for kraken.com to analyze. However, if the reviews were similar to those mentioned for Coinbase, common themes might include account access issues, poor customer service, and unresolved technical problems, leading to user dissatisfaction. Satisfaction could come from successful transactions and responsive support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Examine the reviews over different dates provided and analyze if there are any trends or changes in user sentiment or the types of issues reported over time. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to a range of reviews over different dates, so I cannot analyze trends or changes in user sentiment or issue types over time.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for kraken.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have specific reviews for Kraken.com to analyze. Without actual review content, I cannot extract key phrases or words that indicate common areas of concern or praise for Kraken.com.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the actual ratings or a numerical dataset to calculate an average rating or analyze the distribution of ratings, so I cannot provide the general user satisfaction level quantitatively.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Generate concise summaries for each review to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the actual reviews, so I cannot provide summaries of them. However, based on the context given, users are warning about potentially untrustworthy practices and poor customer service from the company in question. Positive reviews mention successful transactions, while negative ones focus on service reliability and customer support issues.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews praise successful trading and prompt withdrawals, while negative reviews criticize account closures, poor customer service, and technical issues. Key differentiators are the reliability of service and quality of customer support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the kraken.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews suggest Kraken's support is efficient and helpful, with quick responses and low fees, contrasting with complaints about Coinbase's ineffective support. However, some users report mystifying account closures and poor service from Kraken, indicating inconsistencies in customer support experiences.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Based on the review sentiments and contents, predict potential future issues kraken.com might face or areas where they could improve. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Kraken.com could face trust and legal issues if they don't enhance customer service, clarify account suspension policies, and resolve issues promptly. Transparency and support responsiveness improvements are essential to maintain user trust and meet regulatory standards.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify any outliers or unusual reviews that deviate significantly from the general consensus, which might warrant further investigation. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to specific reviews beyond the provided context, so I cannot identify outliers or unusual reviews. The general consensus suggests caution due to mixed experiences, but without more data, pinpointing deviations is not possible.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of the company in question reveal a pattern of customer dissatisfaction, with users specifically warning about untrustworthy practices and poor customer service. These concerns suggest that the company may have systemic issues that affect its reliability and trustworthiness in the eyes of its customers. Positive feedback does exist, indicating that some transactions are completed successfully, but the negative reviews highlight significant areas that require attention. To address these issues, the company should investigate the root causes of customer complaints, particularly focusing on improving transparency and customer support. Further investigation into the specific nature of the untrustworthy practices mentioned by users could help the company to make targeted improvements and restore consumer confidence.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have used many different crypto…
list_of_reviews.review: I have used many different crypto exchanges the last 9 years. Kraken is the best in my estimation. The people behind it are trustworthy honourable people. Their fees are very reasonable. The interface is quite use friendly and works well. I felt obliged to write this review after I saw all the bad reviews..

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stole my money
list_of_reviews.review: Been using for about a month. Deposits always go missing and you have to ask the customer support for it to be credited to your account.Made a large deposit today, again it didn't show up in my account so I asked customer support. After a while they told me they were closing my account for 'security reasons' and they would return my money sometime in the future???So why wasn't I informed my account was closed before I made a deposit? I could still login prior to doing so.Absolutely disgraceful. No wonder they have such shockingly poor reviews here. So many better exchanges out there to go with. Thieves.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I read these reviews before using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I honestly wish I read the reviews about Kraken before using it.I created a Kraken account a few months ago and had no issues with KYC. I only had a few hundred dollars of crypto in my and very rarely used my account. All of a sudden I got an email saying my account is being closed and I nearly lost my crypto.Kraken refuses to give any reason for the closure. They say it's for security reasons but we all know it's an excuse.The support is also terrible and it's nearly impossible to reach support.I did some research and it seems this is common.DO NOT USE KRAKEN

list_of_reviews.review_title: Closed my account with no warning for…
list_of_reviews.review: Closed my account with no warning for no reason.  Thankfully i never had anything in it. Their 'support' is clearly automated with a persons name on it to make it seem more real. Despite not even replying to my query 5 days later they send me a how did we do survey. Truly believe they are just trolling at this point. It appears they are doing this left right and centre taking peoples money in the process. Feel sorry for anyone who had money in there. Cowboys

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account locked!
list_of_reviews.review: They just locked my account without reason. I sent them already countless emails but customer support doesn't care. Avoid at all costs!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: kraken stole my money!!!!
list_of_reviews.review: i have fully verified my account and have transferred 2000 eur to my kraken account from my bank, after when kraken received my money they closed my account with out any reason and explanation what happen. I asked them to return my money but they want me to go to police and to do report.looks like total SCAM. dont invest into kraken ever!My ticket number is 12657316

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable customer support
list_of_reviews.review: I've been asked to verify my identity twice this year already. No issues the first time. Second time their verification process didn't work correctly due to an issue with the site using your camera. I emailed support. They got back days after telling me they knew they were having this issue. Never got back again even though I emailed them several times. Days later I tried again and it worked. A week ago I was asked to send a proof of address since I had moved. Still waiting...

list_of_reviews.review_title: This is how they treat long-time customers
list_of_reviews.review: AA87 N84G 6RRF BA7I Being a loyal user of Kraken since November 2021, I was using Kraken on a weekly basis, I have a fully verified account and suddenly I get an email that I needed to send in new documents because of a change in their policies and that I had to do this within 30 days. I complied immediately and sent all the documents they want. Afterwards I received a deposit of 1060 USDT, which first got stuck on confirming for a full day, and now all of a sudden is put ON HOLD. This money was sent for my newborn son and they are not crediting this to my account. Only response is they are working 24/7/365 and will receive an update soon as they are reviewing my account. This is no way to treat your customers who have used your platform for years on end! How long can it take to check a bank statement and a face picture??? Still waiting on response on Ticket # 12686601Update: while promising to put me on the front of the line, I have sent mails, talked to their support but they are completely ignoring me. People DO NOT TAKE THE RISK! USE DIFFERENT EXCHANGES!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken Support team are trying to lose customers
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken support agents reply with incorrect information in their responses. Recently they have required customers to confirm their identity ( KYC ) and their using "persona" to upload your ID and video selfie. Well, after doing all the necessary steps, it still did not recognise my documents and I was locked out of my account. Upon contacting Kraken support, the first support person says their "devs" are working on it. No reply for 5 days after I write back telling them to unlock my account. Then I'm told by another support person that the selfie was not recognised and can I do it again. Now "person" asks for my ID again, which I already uploaded and for some reson it doesn't recognise my ID and can't take the pic. Then I contact customer support again for the 4th time and the latest person tells me to try on another device and that my address has changed. IT HAS NOT! Been living in the same address for over 5 years. What is going on with Kraken support members? Are they just copy and pastiing replies and not reading what the customer is asking? Are they trying to lose customers, because if they are, they are doing a great job at it! AND, don't even try to call them... there is no answer. Phone lines are closed!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Quite better than other Platforms
list_of_reviews.review: Quite better than other Platforms. I have problems investing from Bank. With Kraken was extremely quick. Also my issue with Support was handle pretty fast.My experience is positive here.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I opened an account which was promptly terminated without explanation by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account.  Submitted my proof of residence.  Deposited a small amount of money. Within a week I receive a notice that my account is being closed with no explanation "due to security reasons".   My mailing address is a PO Box in Massachusetts.  I submitted my electric bill as proof of address.  Duh, the mailing address on my mail is to the PO Box so of course proof shows the PO Box.   License shows physical address.  So I am not sure why the account was closed.  I was told to withdraw my initial deposited funds.  Money was returned.  Seems to me this is a "business" that does not want peoples business. Ticket # 12602633

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken is a crock of s h i t
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken is a crock of s h i t. My deposit was flagged as suspicious by the bank and when I queried this with Kraken I got an email informing me my account will be closed and I can’t open another account.No explanation, no reason.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Potential criminal enterprise - extreme negligence at best
list_of_reviews.review: I have had a kraken account for years and all was fine, till some weeks ago a verification request came up. I have sent all required documents various times, got in contact with them and was told everything was fine and to wait. My account is completely legal, the funds are of transparent origin, all my paperwork is in order and I have complied every step of the way. Nevertheless, all of a sudden my access to the account and the funds has been cut off. I have no idea if kraken has illegally appropriated my funds or what is going on. Their support desk is completely unresponsive, complaints are not taken serious at all, in most cases not even answered. If you have an account there, close it, take your money and run. I regret deeply entrusting them with my money, big mistake

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken canceled my account after I made…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken canceled my account after I made a test deposit to verify deposit. Now they won't refund my balance or give me a reason for closing the account. As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible service
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible service. My ticket has been pending for months and there is no other follow up than some standard templates im being sent. I cannot log into my account because their verification system does not allow me to upload the right documents. Kraken is not following up correctly. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken are thieves. Ticket#12566698
list_of_reviews.review: I don't know where I should even start. The customer experience cannot get worse than this. It's a straight robbery. I deposited with Interac transfer a few days ago 3000 CAD into my Kraken account and received confirmation from both the bank and Interac that the money was collected. Ticket number #12566698. Reaching out to the live chat wasn't a fruitful idea - they have made me wait for 6 hours a few times and never got a response. The only response was an auto-reply saying I would receive an email which I never did! My bank cannot recall the transfer so my money went to nowhere! Happy Halving Day (for Kraken, not investors)!Beware of this!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I could leave a zero star
list_of_reviews.review: I wish I could leave a zero stars for support! I opened an account so that I could offramp some XRP. I can understand that my initial proof of address was rejected as part of the verification, but it has been a nightmare ever since I tried to correct that. Support reached out asking for this proof, which I gave. I have been ghosted for the past two weeks, and whenever I reach out to live support (which takes 3 hours) I am told the ticket is still open.I have asked to close the account because I found an alternative, and the support also says I should email my request to the same person who is ghosting me. It seems creating an account works like clockwork, but deleting one is practically impossible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Kraken at all costs - Terrible experience
list_of_reviews.review: I would strongly advise against using Kraken. On April 4th, 2024, I transferred a significant amount of money into my Kraken account. As of today, the funds are still being held by the platform. I have reached out to their support team multiple times, and all they have said is that they have a high volume of requests and that they have escalated my issue to a specialized team.This is completely unacceptable. It feels like outright fraud to hold onto customers' money indefinitely with no resolution in sight. There are much better cryptocurrency exchanges out there that provide reliable service and timely transactions. Do yourself a favor and avoid Kraken - it's just not worth the headache and potential loss of your hard-earned money. Terrible experience overall.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Excellent and helpful and efficient support service
list_of_reviews.review: I have had almost immediate help that was very efficient from Kraken support on several occasions the last time was 26th March Cant understand why people are complaining Amongst the lowest fees too. Much better functionality than Coinbase

list_of_reviews.review_title: Not Great
list_of_reviews.review: This platform is quite hostile to users. 1.Lost of hidden behind the scene messy doings. 2.Very high fees on everything, for nothing. 3.They like to hold your account hostage often and at all the worst possible times. I have experienced blocks and locks and all manner of interference and corresponding loses.4.Every single support requests results on very lengthy and tech complex 'KYC' audits and compliances 'requests' instead of fixing anything.Their KYC's is 'requested' very very often, not once, but repeatedly anytime they are contacted for support or for anything else regardless of having already gone through their whole system of supposed KYC. 5. Support, contacts and queries are passed along from 'agent's to 'agent's and never answered. Then the whole thing repeats again.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for kraken.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the reviews or the ability to analyze content for key phrases and words. Therefore, I cannot provide an analysis of common areas of concern or praise for kraken.com.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the reviews or their details such as date, rating, title, and content. Therefore, I cannot calculate the average rating or analyze the distribution of ratings to determine user satisfaction levels.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the specific reviews, their dates, ratings, titles, or content. Therefore, I cannot generate a summary of user opinions. To create such a summary, one would need to read and analyze the actual reviews.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the specific reviews or their content, so I cannot provide a contrast between the topics mentioned in positive and negative reviews or determine key differentiators in user experiences.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the kraken.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews suggest mixed experiences with Kraken's support team, with some customers reporting efficient and helpful service, while others express dissatisfaction with support interactions and account management issues. Overall, the effectiveness and responsiveness appear inconsistent.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews indicate a strong interest in technological advancements, particularly the integration of AI and NFTs, suggesting that innovation is a key driver for engagement within the community. Market growth is another focal point, with discussions on staking and updates on ecosystem developments highlighting a proactive interest in the expansion and scaling of projects. Community news, including project introductions and strategies for resilience, reflects a desire for robust community engagement and support mechanisms. However, there is a noticeable absence of dialogue on regulatory governance, which could be an area for improvement, as understanding the regulatory landscape is crucial for long-term sustainability and compliance. Additionally, further investigation into market predictions could provide investors with a more comprehensive view of potential risks and opportunities, aligning with their focus on diversification and long-term value.
